live_updates: No changes to report at this time. Next updates will be provided tomorrow as they become available. Thank you for your patience.

Local Officials and Fortis BC have restricted access to the site due to ongoing wildfire activity. Shaw Technicians are awaiting for site clearance before further repairs can take place. We will provide updates as available. Thank you.
On-site technicians continue working diligently to resolve this outage.
Tech crews continue to work in the area to restore services.
Due to the complexity of this outage, our technicians are still working to resolve it.
Due to safety concerns in the area, our technicians are not currently able to access our equipment to restore services. Further updates will be provided tomorrow as they become available.
Technical crews are dispatched to arrive on site to investigate this matter.
Our teams are looking into it.
39907.summary: Some customers in Grand Forks and surrounding areas are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
39907.title: July 23 – Grand Forks (Christina Lake, Midway) | All Services - Outage (Fix in Progress)
